item.title: Meta 任命微软的马奥尼为首席法务官
item.description: Meta Platforms 周二表示，公司已任命 C.J. Mahoney 为新任首席法务官，C.J. Mahoney 是一位经验丰富的法务主管，曾在技术部门和美国政府任职。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Tuesday it has appointed C.J. Mahoney, a seasoned legal executive with a career in both the technology sector and U.S. government, as its new chief legal officer.】

item.title: 大多数美联储银行投票反对 12 月贴现率变动
item.description: 周二的美联储贴现率会议记录显示，在上个月的美联储会议之前，美联储三分之二地区银行的董事投票决定维持向商业银行收取的紧急贷款利率不变。【原文：Directors at two-thirds of the Federal Reserve's regional banks voted to leave the interest rate charged to commercial banks for emergency loans unchanged ahead of last month's Fed meeting, minutes of the central bank's discount rate meetings showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高盛以 1.48 万亿美元的交易额荣登全球并购排行榜榜首
item.description: 在 2025 年的全球交易排行榜上，高盛再次独占鳌头，在这一年里，高风险的政治戏剧和越来越大的兼并活动占据了市场份额和榜首位置。【原文：Goldman Sachs once again dominated the league tables for global dealmaking in 2025, taking market share and the top spot in a year marked by high-stakes political drama and increasingly bigger mergers.】

item.title: 美国全国广播公司环球公司 2026 年冬奥会广告时段因 "前所未有 "的需求而售罄
item.description: 美国全国广播公司环球公司（NBCUniversal）周二表示，2026 年意大利冬奥会的广告位已在二月初冬奥会开幕前一个月售罄。【原文：NBCUniversal has sold out advertising spots for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Italy a month before the start of the Games in early February, the Comcast-owned company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大横贯航空飞行员批准五年合同
item.description: 据代表该航空公司 725 名成员的航空公司飞行员协会（Air Line Pilots Association）称，加拿大横贯航空（Air Transat）的飞行员周二以压倒性多数通过了一份为期五年的新合同。【原文：Pilots at Canadian airline Air Transat overwhelmingly approved a new five-year contract on Tuesday, according to the Air Line Pilots Association, which represents 725 members at the carrier.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉石油将促进美国炼油商的发展，损害加拿大生产商的利益
item.description: 委内瑞拉石油出口的全面恢复将使美国的炼油厂受益，并降低其燃料生产成本，如果美国取消对这个南美国家的制裁，炼油厂将有能力吸收每天约 100 万桶自由贸易原油中的大部分。【原文：A full-scale resumption of Venezuelan oil exports would benefit refiners in the United States and lower their fuel production costs, with the refineries capable of absorbing most of the roughly 1 million barrels per day of crude that would trade freely if U.S. sanctions on the South American country are removed.】

item.title: 独家报道Comerica 股东批准与 Fifth Third Bancorp 的 109 亿美元交易
item.description: Comerica 和 Fifth Third Bancorp 两家公司表示，Comerica 股东周二批准以 109 亿美元的价格出售给更大的竞争对手 Fifth Third Bancorp。【原文：Comerica shareholders on Tuesday approved a $10.9 billion sale to larger rival Fifth Third Bancorp , the two companies said, ignoring an activist hedge fund's calls to block the deal after having initially urged the bank to put itself up for sale.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 LMArena 在最新一次融资中将估值提高了两倍，达到 17 亿美元
item.description: LMArena 周二表示，随着投资者不断向人工智能初创企业投入资金，该公司在新一轮融资中筹集了 1.5 亿美元，其估值在大约八个月内增长了两倍，达到 17 亿美元。【原文：LMArena said on Tuesday its valuation had tripled to $1.7 billion in about eight months, following a new funding round where it raised $150 million, as investors continue to pour money into artificial intelligence startups.】

item.title: Hg Capital 将以 64 亿美元收购 OneStream
item.description: 金融软件制造商 OneStream 周二表示，收购公司 Hg Capital 将以 64 亿美元的全现金交易收购 OneStream。【原文：Buyout firm Hg Capital will buy OneStream in an all-cash deal valued at $6.4 billion, the financial software maker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司将把 "爱国者 "导弹产能提高两倍多
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周二表示，该公司已与美国国防部达成一项为期七年的协议，将其 PAC-3 导弹拦截器的年产量从之前的约 600 件提高到 2000 件。【原文：Lockheed Martin said on Tuesday that it has reached a seven-year agreement with the U.S. Department of War to increase the annual production capacity for its PAC-3 missile interceptors to 2,000 units a year from about 600 previously.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋发表言论后，数据中心制冷相关股票下跌
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示该公司即将推出的芯片可大幅降低数据中心的制冷需求之后，美国供暖、通风和空调相关公司的股票周二下跌。【原文：Shares of U.S. heating, ventilation and air conditioning-related companies dropped on Tuesday after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said that the company's upcoming chips could significantly reduce cooling requirements in data centers.】

item.title: 美国政府正在为 Nvidia 在中国的许可证 "疯狂工作"，出货日期仍未知
item.description: Nvidia 首席财务官周二表示，美国政府正在 "热火朝天地 "处理 Nvidia 向中国运输其 H200 芯片的许可申请，但该公司仍不知道何时才能获得批准。【原文：The United States government is "working feverishly" on license applications for Nvidia to ship its H200 chips to China, but the company still does not know when they will be approved, Nvidia's chief financial officer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 百威英博将向美国啤酒厂注资 3000 万美元，以提高 Michelob Ultra 啤酒的产量
item.description: 世界顶级啤酒制造商安海斯-布希英博公司（Anheuser-Busch InBev）周二表示，将向其美国啤酒厂投资 3,000 万美元，作为在美国创造和维持制造业就业机会战略的一部分。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev , will invest $30 million in its U.S. brewery as part of its strategy to create and sustain manufacturing jobs in the country, the world's top brewer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 微软与美国主要电网运营商合作实现中西部电力系统现代化
item.description: 本周二，美国中西部电网与微软公司（Microsoft）合作，这是大科技公司寻求合作以帮助确保人工智能所需的大量电力供应的最新案例。【原文：The U.S. Midwest grid has teamed up with Microsoft , it said on Tuesday, in the latest instance of Big Tech turning to collaboration to help ensure the massive amounts of electricity needed for artificial intelligence are available.】

item.title: TPG 收购住宅建筑商 Lennar 持有的 Quarterra 大部分股份，并承诺再出资 10 亿美元
item.description: 资产管理公司 TPG 周二表示，已收购住宅建筑商 Lennar 多户住宅开发和投资管理平台的多数股权，并承诺为该业务追加 10 亿美元。【原文：Asset management firm TPG has acquired a majority interest in homebuilder Lennar's multifamily development and investment management platform and committed an additional $1 billion for the business, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德国部长称欧盟必须采取法律措施阻止 Grok 的人工智能性化照片
item.description: 德国媒体部长沃尔夫拉姆-魏玛（Wolfram Weimer）周二告诉路透社，欧盟委员会必须采取法律行动，阻止埃隆-马斯克的社交媒体平台 X 上发生的 "性骚扰产业化"。【原文：The EU Commission must take legal action to stop the "industrialization of sexual harassment" taking place on Elon Musk's social media platform X, Germany's media minister, Wolfram Weimer, told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: Marvell斥资5.4亿美元收购网络设备公司XConn，推动人工智能基础设施发展
item.description: Marvell Technology 公司周二表示，将收购网络设备提供商 XConn Technologies 公司，交易金额约为 5.4 亿美元。【原文：Marvell Technology said on Tuesday it will buy networking equipment provider XConn Technologies in a deal worth about $540 million, as the chipmaker doubles down on data center hardware amid a race to expand artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 说明：全球最低企业税协议的现状
item.description: 超过 145 个国家已同意更新一项具有里程碑意义的全球税收协议，在华盛顿对旨在确保大公司在全球至少缴纳 15% 税款的规则进行反击后，该协议为美国的跨国公司规定了豁免条款。【原文：More than 145 countries have agreed to update a landmark global tax deal, carving out exemptions for U.S. multinationals after Washington pushed back against rules designed to ensure big corporations pay at least 15% tax worldwide.】

item.title: 米兰告诉《福克斯商业》：美联储今年应大幅降息
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）在美国央行的任期将于本月晚些时候结束，他在周二表示，今年美国需要积极降息，以保持经济向前发展。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran, whose term at the U.S. central bank ends later this month, said on Tuesday aggressive U.S. interest rate cuts are needed this year to keep the economy moving forward.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯将于下月向所有外国投资者开放金融市场
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯市场监管机构周二表示，沙特阿拉伯计划从 2 月 1 日起向所有外国投资者开放金融市场，同时放宽规则以吸引更多海外资金。【原文：Saudi Arabia plans to open its financial markets to all foreign investors from February 1, the Gulf country's market regulator said on Tuesday, as it eases rules to attract more money from abroad.】

item.title: 福特因混合动力车和经济型皮卡的需求，美国汽车年销量增长 6
item.description: 福特公司周二公布，2025 年美国汽车销量增长，原因是消费者对其混合动力车型和经济型皮卡的需求旺盛，帮助福特抵消了电动汽车销售放缓的影响。【原文：Ford on Tuesday reported higher auto sales in the U.S. in 2025, as strong consumer appetite for its hybrid models and affordable pickup truck helped it offset slowing electric vehicle sales.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，TPG 正在洽谈收购 UnitedHealth 的 Optum 英国分公司
item.description: 据天空新闻周二报道，美国私募股权公司 TPG 接近收购联合健康（UnitedHealth）的 Optum 英国业务，交易价值在 12 亿英镑（16.2 亿美元）至 14 亿英镑之间。【原文：U.S. private equity firm TPG is close to acquiring UnitedHealth's Optum UK business, in a deal worth between 1.2 billion pounds ($1.62 billion) and 1.4 billion pounds, Sky News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国要求马斯克紧急处理 X 上的 "深度伪造 "问题
item.description: 英国周二敦促埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体网站 X 紧急处理其网络上大量出现的私密 "deepfake "图片，加入了欧洲对该平台上未经同意的图片激增的强烈抗议。【原文：Britain on Tuesday urged Elon Musk's social media site X to urgently address a proliferation of intimate 'deepfake' images on its network, joining a European outcry over a surge in non-consensual imagery on the platform.】

item.title: 美国航空公司将为忠诚计划会员推出免费 Wi-Fi 服务
item.description: 美国航空公司（American Airlines）周二表示，将与电信公司 AT&T 合作，为加入该公司忠诚计划的客户提供免费的机上 Wi-Fi 服务。【原文：American Airlines said on Tuesday it would launch free in-flight Wi-Fi in partnership with telecom firm AT&T for customers enrolled in the carrier's loyalty program.】

item.title: AWS 与 Aumovio 共同拓展人工智能驱动的自动驾驶汽车开发
item.description: 亚马逊云计算部门与德国汽车硬件供应商 Aumovio 合作，为自动驾驶汽车的商业推广提供支持。【原文：Amazon's cloud unit has partnered with German automotive hardware supplier Aumovio to support the commercial rollout of self-driving vehicles, starting with Aurora's autonomous trucks, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国需求强劲，供应紧缩，Meta 推迟雷朋显示眼镜的全球推广计划
item.description: Meta 公司周二表示，由于供应短缺和美国市场的强劲需求，该公司已决定暂停雷朋显示眼镜的国际扩张。【原文：Meta said on Tuesday it has decided to pause international expansion of its Ray-Ban Display glasses due to short supply and strong demand in the United States.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉输往亚洲的石油处于停滞状态，雪佛龙公司的出口却源源不断--航运数据
item.description: 航运数据显示，由于美国通过石油禁运向委内瑞拉施压，委内瑞拉的主要石油港口周二已进入第五天没有向国营的委内瑞拉石油公司（PDVSA）在亚洲的客户交付原油，而亚洲客户是这个欧佩克国家的主要买家。【原文：Venezuela's main oil ports on Tuesday entered their fifth day without delivering crude for state-run PDVSA's customers in Asia, which are the OPEC country's main buyers, shipping data showed, as the U.S. presses the nation through an oil embargo.】

item.title: Variant Bio 推出人工智能平台，利用基因数据发现新药
item.description: 私营生物技术公司Variant Bio周二表示，该公司已推出一个平台，利用人工智能基因数据发现新的候选药物，并将其送入人体试验阶段。【原文：Variant Bio, a private biotech firm, said on Tuesday it has launched a platform that uses artificial intelligence on genetic data to discover new drug candidates to send into human trials.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称美国面临央行两项任务的风险
item.description: 里士满联储主席汤姆-巴尔金（Tom Barkin）周二表示，鉴于美联储失业率和通胀目标面临的风险，美国联邦储备委员会利率的进一步变化将需要根据新的数据进行 "微调"。【原文：Further U.S. Federal Reserve interest rate changes will need to be "finely tuned" to incoming data given risks to both the Fed's unemployment and inflation goals, Richmond Fed president Tom Barkin said on Tuesday.】

item.title: AIG 首席执行官扎菲诺将卸任并转任执行董事长
item.description: 美国国际集团周二表示，首席执行官彼得-扎菲诺（Peter Zaffino）将于今年年中卸任，转而担任董事会执行主席。【原文：American International Group said on Tuesday CEO Peter Zaffino will step down by mid-year and move into the role of executive chair of the board.】
